intro: Bringing ideas to life through clean code and thoughtful design. Experienced in building responsive, intuitive web applications that put users first.

From building responsive web apps as a freelancer to contributing to scalable front-end systems and APIs during my internships, I bring a well-rounded, real-world approach to development.
